To erase data and start clean:

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
```

To push changes in Git after working on the PEC1.

```{bash eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
git remote add origin https://github.com/aescos/Escos-Lopez-Alejandra-PEC2.git

git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"
git branch -M main


git push -u origin main

# They will ask about the user name in github (aescos)
# and password (use PAT token for this month: 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)
```
